Sentencas: A water-based tape-casting slurry is reported to prepare the ceria and scandia co-doped zirconia (ScSZ) electrolyte films.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The slurry is characterized and optimized through Zeta potential and rheological property measurements.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Smooth and flat ScSZ electrolyte films are obtained by improving the sintering process.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The microstructure, electrical performance, and mechanical property of ScSZ with adding different contents of Al2O3 are also investigated.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results show that a proper amount of Al2O3 has a beneficial effect on the densification of ScSZ.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A significant decrease in the grain boundary resistance of ScSZ is observed by adding 0.5 wt% Al2O3.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The bending strength of the sample with 0.5 wt% Al2O3 (ScSZ-0.5A) is about 400 MPa, which is 20% higher than pure ScSZ.
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The ScSZ-0.5A electrolyte film fabricated by the water-based tape-casting method shows appropriate electrical conductivity and high mechanical strength, which is promising for practical application in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Al2O3 Toughening ScSZ Electrolyte Fabricated by Water-Based Tape Casting Technique for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
